name: Private EYE (itch) (HelmetNotIncluded)
description:
Hello!

Thank you for playing Private EYE! This is my first completed proof of concept!

In the full game, you will take on the roll of  Theodore Carter. A post XXXXX war detective. After looking into a recent patricide, Theodore glimpses behind the vale and realizes his life and choices may not be his own. Cosmic and body horror ensues.

In this proof of concept is NOT canonical to the final project, but instead is  short story containing    the same character . It is an example of the basic gameplay as well as art style. I hope you enjoy it!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/HelmetNotIncluded

Twitter: @SodaHelmet

Music By:   James Quanvie  and   J. J.

J.J.'s Spotify :https://open.spotify.com/artist/0qVAqaZMzguXIBRk0UfEZO
